name: Super Cakeboy
description:
Once again take the role of Cakeboy in this sequel to Khimera: Destroy all Monster Girls' "game-within-a-game". Run, jump, punch and use the variety of pastry-themed weapons at your disposal to blast through 9 action-packed stages. Face off against Cakeboy's eternal rival, the enigmatic Dark Cake and send him packing!

Items no chef should leave at home:

Pick up far-away items with the Croissant Boomerang, set traps with the exploding Cupcake Bomb, perform trick-shots with the bouncing Super Donut, or just punch them in the face! The choice is yours!

Short and Sweet:

This snack-sized game's nine levels can be completed in about 20 minutes but hidden collectable ingredients, achievements and other secrets give you extra goals for subsequent play-throughs.
